snippet: Bernhard Langer rallied to capture the 3M Championship in Blaine, Minn., for the second time in four years, shooting a 10-under-par 62 to overcome a six-stroke deficit and win by two strokes.
abstract: Bernhard Langer captures golf's 3M Championship in Blaine, Minn, for the second time in four years.
lead_paragraph: Bernhard Langer rallied to capture the 3M Championship in Blaine, Minn., for the second time in four years, shooting a 10-under-par 62 to overcome a six-stroke deficit and win by two strokes.

headline.main: Langer Shoots a 62 to Overtake Peoples
headline.print_headline: Langer Shoots a 62 To Overtake Peoples
